location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to Captain C J Maillard, commanding the Honourable Company's Cruiser (HCC) Amherst

mods.abstract: Stannus informs Maillard that the Amherstwas required to take Captain Robert Taylor to Bussorah [Basra]. The Amherstwas also to remain at the service of Captain Taylor at Bussorah, should circumstances require it.
